result.arabic_text: وَإِن يَرَوۡاْ كِسۡفٗا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ سَاقِطٗا يَقُولُواْ سَحَابٞ مَّرۡكُومٞ
result.translation: If they were to see pieces of the sky falling down[15], they would still say, “[This is only] a mass of clouds.”
result.footnotes: [15] As a sign of the punishment that they requested.
